name: The Escape (itch) (Patrick Sharpe)
description:
The Escape

You have been wrongly framed for murdering your wife and as a result, you have been sent to prison for life. However, on this day, you have been given the opportunity to escape this prison on one condition...Don't Die!

This has been a wonderful solo Project that I've worked on and my goal for this game was to focus on improving my Level Design skills
